description:
Fixing problem of app list showing up in wrong location on second screen

BUG=288725
TEST=visual

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=223238

messages.text:
https://codereview.chromium.org/23440036/diff/1/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc
File ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/23440036/diff/1/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc#newcode173
ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc:173: ash::ScreenAsh::ConvertRectFromScreen(window, applist_button_bounds);
This works by coincident because window's default location is at 0x0.
You should pass window->GetRootWindow() instead.

https://codereview.chromium.org/23440036/diff/1/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc
File ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/23440036/diff/1/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc#newcode173
ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc:173: ash::ScreenAsh::ConvertRectFromScreen(window, applist_button_bounds);
On 2013/09/13 21:11:13, oshima wrote:
> This works by coincident because window's default location is at 0x0.

Small correction. The default location is at the root window's origin.
(0x0 in root window coordinates)

Changed. Please have another look!

https://codereview.chromium.org/23440036/diff/1/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc
File ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/23440036/diff/1/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc#newcode173
ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc:173: ash::ScreenAsh::ConvertRectFromScreen(window, applist_button_bounds);
On 2013/09/13 21:13:43, oshima wrote:
> On 2013/09/13 21:11:13, oshima wrote:
> > This works by coincident because window's default location is at 0x0.
> 
> Small correction. The default location is at the root window's origin.
> (0x0 in root window coordinates)

Done.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/skuhne@chromium.org/23440036/6001

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/23440036/diff/6001/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc
File ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/23440036/diff/6001/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc#newcode171
ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc:171: GetAppListButtonView()->GetBoundsInScreen();
Would it not be correct to just use bounds () here and skip the subsequent conversion?

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/23440036/diff/6001/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc
File ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/23440036/diff/6001/ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc#newcode171
ash/wm/app_list_controller.cc:171: GetAppListButtonView()->GetBoundsInScreen();
never mind, just confused.

subject: Fixing problem of app list showing up in wrong location on second screen
